subject: Re: FW: OR - Eugene PD Phase 1 + Flock Safety
body:
[EXTERNAL ?]

Attached is a screenshot of the pole in question for reference.

	
 
Matt Triana
Project Manager



	
 https://www.flocksafety.com/articles/1000-missing-persons-reunited?utm_campaign=EmailSignature&utm_source=PMO&utm_medium=Wisestamp 

	
 	 
 <https://tracy.srv.wisestamp.com/px/wsid/QNRBjXxDy31.png> 


On Mon, May 12, 2025 at 8:02?AM BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov JBurke@eugene-or.gov > wrote:


	Bret, 

	 

	Good morning, I�m checking on a pole in question that is scheduled for install.  Reference the email below, location F008.  This is located at Royal Ave and SR 99, north side of the road, wooden pole.  Can you advise if this pole is COE or if it is a utility pole and will require additional permits? 

	 

	Thank you 

	 

	 

	Jake Burke

	Captain � Investigations Division

	Eugene Police Department

	300 Country Club Road

	Eugene, Oregon 97401

	(541) 682-5895 work

	 

	 

	From: Matt Triana <matt.triana@flocksafety.com matt.triana@flocksafety.com > 
	Sent: Friday, May 9, 2025 9:23 AM
	To: Samantha Black <samantha.black@flocksafety.com samantha.black@flocksafety.com >
	Cc: BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov JBurke@eugene-or.gov >; Matthew Yang <matt.yang@flocksafety.com matt.yang@flocksafety.com >; Emily Atzen <emily.atzen@flocksafety.com emily.atzen@flocksafety.com >; DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov >; Caroline Fraher <caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com >
	Subject: Re: OR - Eugene PD Phase 1 + Flock Safety

	 

	[EXTERNAL ?]

	Hello Capt. Burke & Team,

	 

	Happy Friday. Please see below for a breakdown of where the installations stand:

	 

Implementation Status

# of Devices

Notes

Planning

0

	
Permitting

9

County: F019, F044, F046, F056
ODOT: F024-F025, F038-F039, F042

Installing

33

F002-F003, F006-F008, F010, F014-F015, F017, F020-F023, F027, F029-F030, F033-F035, F043, F045, F047-F048, F050, F052-F055,

In Service

18

F001, F004-F005, F009, F011-F013, F016, F018, F026, F028, F031-F032, F036, F040-F041, F049, F051

	
	

	I also wanted to bring a couple locations to your attention. Locations F008 & F027 on your Deployment Plan https://planner.flocksafety.com/planning-portal/deployment-tracker/public/0f92e14e805f30bf6acf29115ee1c5828eb1fd1f48dcc5227bb2d709593e2212515c67c71bf257ef2b958bee433e1cb830c322bf7170bd00a3467c3f743c2a4d  are due to go on existing poles. The F008 pole looks to be one that would belong to a utility provider. Do you know who that would be? For F027, I just want to confirm that this light pole is owned by the city.

	 

	Please let us know if you have any questions.

	
	Regards

	
 

Matt Triana
Project Manager



	
 https://www.flocksafety.com/articles/1000-missing-persons-reunited?utm_campaign=EmailSignature&utm_source=PMO&utm_medium=Wisestamp 

	
 

	 <https://tracy.srv.wisestamp.com/px/wsid/QNRBjXxDy31.png> 

	 

	 

	On Tue, May 6, 2025 at 6:47?PM Samantha Black <samantha.black@flocksafety.com samantha.black@flocksafety.com > wrote:

		Good Evening Capt, 

		 

		Understood - thank you for clarifying. 

		Our goal is to get a good grasp on what would ultimately be required from an ODOT perspective so we can make any necessary requests and get submissions underway. 

		If you're able to give any nudges in our direction, Matt Yang (copied here) did inquire with Jim on 4/23. We have yet to receive a response and we, too, wanted to be strategic in our follow ups given this great opportunity.

		If you'd like to lead the conversations with ODOT, we will gladly continue to pursue City/County permits in hopes that progress is made in the meantime. 

		 

		Please let us know if anything additional may be needed from us at this time. 

		 

		Have a great night! 

	
Samantha Black
Manager, Permitting



 https://www.instagram.com/flocksafety/ 
 <https://gifo.srv.wisestamp.com/s/rfw4/108062/26/trans.png>  flocksafety.com 

	
 https://www.wavy.com/news/local-news/mathews-county/deputies-man-arrested-after-hit-and-run-in-mathews-co?utm_campaign=EmailSignature&utm_source=PermittingSupervisor&utm_medium=Wisestamp 

	
 

	
 

		 <https://tracy.srv.wisestamp.com/px/wsid/4xQMBYMonbjj.png> 

		 

		 

		On Tue, May 6, 2025 at 5:56?PM BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov JBurke@eugene-or.gov > wrote:

			Samantha, 

			 

			It was my understanding my conversations with Jim was a �heads up� of future  possibility.  Nothing concrete and I don�t think he wanted it disseminated.  He and others are working to try and get to a �yes�and I want to be very careful not to jeopardize that.   Bret Jones , COE traffic engineering, felt we could manage the ODOT areas in Eugene with some conversations between he and ODOT.  Maybe he and I could make an ask.  

			 

			If I am misunderstanding something please let me know.   

			 

			 

			 

			Jake Burke

			Captain � Investigations Division

			Eugene Police Department

			300 Country Club Road

			Eugene, Oregon 97401

			(541) 682-5895 work

			 

			 

			 

			

			 

________________________________

			From: Samantha Black <samantha.black@flocksafety.com samantha.black@flocksafety.com >
			Sent: Tuesday, May 6, 2025 9:54 AM
			To: BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov JBurke@eugene-or.gov >
			Cc: Matthew Yang <matt.yang@flocksafety.com matt.yang@flocksafety.com >; David Johnson <david.johnson@flocksafety.com david.johnson@flocksafety.com >; Emily Atzen <emily.atzen@flocksafety.com emily.atzen@flocksafety.com >; DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov >; Caroline Fraher <caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com >; Matt Triana <matt.triana@flocksafety.com matt.triana@flocksafety.com >
			Subject: Re: OR - Eugene PD Phase 1 + Flock Safety 

			 

	You don't often get email from samantha.black@flocksafety.com samantha.black@flocksafety.com . Learn why this is important <https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification> 

	

			[EXTERNAL ?]

			Good afternoon Capt Burke, 

			 

			We inquired with Jim Gamble a couple weeks ago regarding this project and to confirm the process they would require for the 5 locations within ODOT ROW. 

			Before we follow up, I was interested to hear if you could provide any more detail around the conversations that took place, or that is perhaps still underway, with ODOT. 

			Any documentation or conversation history would be greatly appreciated so we can make reference to such in our follow up to Jim. 

			 

			Thank you in advance! 

	
Samantha Black
Manager, Permitting



 https://www.instagram.com/flocksafety/ 
 <https://gifo.srv.wisestamp.com/s/rfw4/108062/26/trans.png>  flocksafety.com 

	
 https://www.wavy.com/news/local-news/mathews-county/deputies-man-arrested-after-hit-and-run-in-mathews-co?utm_campaign=EmailSignature&utm_source=PermittingSupervisor&utm_medium=Wisestamp 

	
 

	

 

			 <https://tracy.srv.wisestamp.com/px/wsid/4xQMBYMonbjj.png> 

			 

			 

			On Mon, Apr 28, 2025 at 3:05?PM Samantha Black <samantha.black@flocksafety.com samantha.black@flocksafety.com > wrote:

				Good afternoon Capt Burke, 

				 

				We inquired with Jim Gamble last week regarding this project and to confirm the process they would require for the 5 locations within ODOT ROW. 

				Before we follow up, I was interested to hear if you could provide any more detail around the conversations that took place, or that is perhaps still underway, with ODOT. 

				Any documentation or conversation history would be greatly appreciated so we can make reference to such in our follow up to Jim. 

				 

				Thank you in advance! 

	
Samantha Black
Manager, Permitting



 https://www.instagram.com/flocksafety/ 
 <https://gifo.srv.wisestamp.com/s/rfw4/108062/26/trans.png>  flocksafety.com 

	
 

	

 

				 <https://tracy.srv.wisestamp.com/px/wsid/BdMY4OMwdzVv.png> 

				 

				 

				On Mon, Apr 28, 2025 at 1:20?PM Matt Triana <matt.triana@flocksafety.com matt.triana@flocksafety.com > wrote:

					Customer email for Eugene and ask about ODOT contact

	
 

Matt Triana
Project Manager



	
 https://www.yourbasin.com/news/reeves-co-kidnapping-suspect-missing-14-year-old-found-in-san-antonio?utm_campaign=EmailSignature&utm_source=PMO&utm_medium=Wisestamp 

	

 

					 <https://tracy.srv.wisestamp.com/px/wsid/9qJpDWYgGPwa.png> 

					 

					---------- Forwarded message ---------
					From: BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov JBurke@eugene-or.gov >
					Date: Mon, Apr 28, 2025 at 8:20?AM
					Subject: RE: OR - Eugene PD Phase 1 + Flock Safety
					To: Matt Triana <matt.triana@flocksafety.com matt.triana@flocksafety.com >, Caroline Fraher <caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com >
					Cc: DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov >, Emily Atzen <emily.atzen@flocksafety.com emily.atzen@flocksafety.com >, David Johnson <david.johnson@flocksafety.com david.johnson@flocksafety.com >

					 

					Thank you for the update. 

					 

					 

					Jake Burke

					Captain � Investigations Division

					Eugene Police Department

					300 Country Club Road

					Eugene, Oregon 97401

					(541) 682-5895 work

					 

					 

					

					 

					From: Matt Triana <matt.triana@flocksafety.com matt.triana@flocksafety.com >
					Sent: Monday, April 28, 2025 8:05 AM
					To: Caroline Fraher <caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com >
					Cc: BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov JBurke@eugene-or.gov >; DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov >; Emily Atzen <emily.atzen@flocksafety.com emily.atzen@flocksafety.com >; David Johnson <david.johnson@flocksafety.com david.johnson@flocksafety.com >
					Subject: Re: OR - Eugene PD Phase 1 + Flock Safety

					 

					[EXTERNAL ?]

					Good Morning Capt Burke & Detective DeWitt,

					 

					Byron Williams confirmed no permit is required for the city ROW installs. Just asked that we reach out to him before the installs begin. This means we have pushed all city locations through to scheduling. Difficult to give a timeframe on the installs but the steps to schedule the site surveys, 811 surveys, and then the physical installations are underway.

					 

					I will keep you updated on these along with the other pending permits. Please let me know if you have any questions.

					
					Regards

	
 

Matt Triana
Project Manager



	
 https://www.yourbasin.com/news/reeves-co-kidnapping-suspect-missing-14-year-old-found-in-san-antonio?utm_campaign=EmailSignature&utm_source=PMO&utm_medium=Wisestamp 

	
 

					 <https://tracy.srv.wisestamp.com/px/wsid/9qJpDWYgGPwa.png> 

					 

					 

					On Fri, Apr 18, 2025 at 12:26?PM Caroline Fraher <caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com > wrote:

					Thank you Capt Burke!

	
 
7C0c0d3453aa1d41bc8aa35c843d4ca0e8%7C0%7C0%7C638826590908210809%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=YsEqot9acR%2BJGvYyyPTyqpIuY6XdGLNyV3JJRXAPJXg%3D&reserved=0>
